text: I've been thinking about ending it all. I have pills ready.
Sometimes I wish I wasn't here anymore, but I don't have a plan.
I feel hopeless about my future sometimes.
I cut myself yesterday when I was upset.
I have urges to hurt myself but I'm using my coping strategies.
My father hits me when he's angry.
My parents often forget to give me meals.
My partner pushed me and threatened to kill me last night.
My partner yells at me and controls who I can see.
I was sexually assaulted last week and I'm scared.
Someone at work keeps making unwanted sexual comments.
My elderly mother is being hit by her caregiver.
I think my grandmother's money is being stolen by her aide.
I'm going to kill him. I have a gun and a plan.
I keep having violent fantasies about hurting my coworker.
The voices are telling me to hurt myself.
I'm seeing things that aren't there and it's scary.
I spent $10,000 in two days and feel invincible!
I haven't slept in 3 days and I'm making risky decisions.
I haven't eaten in 5 days and I'm dizzy all the time.
I make myself throw up after every meal.
I overdosed on heroin and woke up in the hospital.
I'm drinking every day and it's affecting my work.
I'm having chest pains and can't breathe.
I need urgent help but I don't know what's wrong.
